campaign.name: Campaign Name
campaign.solanaAddressTip: Please ensure using Solana format addresses and token contract addresses
campaign.cannotGetTokenInfo: Unable to get token information, please check if contract address is correct
campaign.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose and details of this campaign...
campaign.solanaLimitDesc: Supports 5-10 addresses per batch (same configuration for ATA creation and transfers)
campaign.csvPlaceholder:
Please paste CSV content, format: address,amount

Example (EVM addresses):
0x742d35Cc6634C0532925a3b844Bc9e7595f0bEb,100.5
0xdAC17F958D2ee523a2206206994597C13D831ec7,200

Example (Solana addresses):
7xKXtg2CW87d97TXJSDpbD5jBkheTqA83TZRuJosgAsU,50.25
DYw8jCTfwHNRJhhmFcbXvVDTqWMEVFBX6ZKUmG5CNSKK,150
campaign.checkCSVFormat: Please check if CSV format is correct
campaign.eip1559Tip: Using EIP-1559 dynamic gas pricing, includes 10% maxFee and 50% priority safety buffer
campaign.legacyGasTip: Using legacy gas pricing, includes 10% safety buffer
campaign.gasPriceVolatilityWarning: Gas price is fetched from RPC in real-time, but may fluctuate during network congestion
campaign.safetyBufferWarning: Estimate includes safety buffer to ensure fast transaction confirmation
campaign.clickToEstimate: Click 'Start Estimate' button to get campaign cost estimate
campaign.pleaseInputValidAddress: Please enter a valid token contract address
campaign.pleaseCompleteForm: Please complete all form information and ensure CSV data is valid
campaign.canExportPrivateKey: You can export the private key to control wallet funds
campaign.privateKeyNotSaved: The private key was not saved correctly when this campaign was created and cannot be exported to control the wallet
campaign.campaignStarted: Campaign started sending! Page will auto-refresh status.
campaign.noPrivateKey: This campaign has no available private key and cannot perform fund withdrawal
campaign.cannotGetBalance: Cannot get balance information, please try again later
campaign.insufficientGas: Insufficient gas balance, please ensure the wallet has at least
campaign.toPayDeployment: to pay for deployment. Current balance:
campaign.confirmDeploy: Confirm to deploy contract for this campaign?
campaign.deploymentWarning: Note: Deployment cannot be undone, please confirm chain configuration and token address are correct.
campaign.securityWarningText: The private key has full control of your wallet. Please keep it safe and never share it with others!
campaign.securityTip1: EVM private keys can be imported to MetaMask, Trust Wallet, and other wallets
campaign.securityTip2: Solana private keys are in 64-byte array format and can be imported to Phantom, Solflare, and other wallets
campaign.securityTip4: Please save the private key in a secure place (such as a password manager)
campaign.securityTip5: Do not take screenshots or transmit the private key over the internet
campaign.securityTip6: Anyone with the private key can control the wallet funds
campaign.tokensSuffix: tokens in the wallet to the specified address
campaign.withdrawNativeWarning: Transfer remaining native tokens in the wallet to the specified address (will reserve gas fees)
campaign.solBalanceInsufficient: Insufficient SOL balance, please ensure the wallet has enough SOL to pay network fees
campaign.invalidTokenAccount: Token account does not exist or is invalid, please check the token address
campaign.tokenAccountNotFound: SPL token account does not exist, please ensure the address is correct
campaign.solanaNetworkTimeout: Solana network connection timeout, please try again later
campaign.solanaBlockhashExpired: Solana blockhash expired, please retry the transaction
campaign.solanaRateLimit: Solana API requests too frequent, please try again later
campaign.solanaOperationFailed: Solana operation failed, please check network connection and balance

history.title: History
history.name: Name
history.noRecordsDesc: Will display here after creating activities

wallet.activityWalletDesc: The system creates an independent wallet for each activity to ensure privacy and security. Use external wallets (such as MetaMask) to fund activity wallets. After the activity is completed, you can manually export the private key to recover remaining funds.
wallet.securityTip1: Each activity uses an independent wallet to prevent address correlation analysis
wallet.securityTip2: Private keys are stored in encrypted format in the local database
wallet.securityTip3: It is recommended to recover remaining funds promptly after the activity ends
wallet.securityTip4: Do not use this application on public computers
wallet.securityWarningText: The private key has full control of your wallet. Please keep it safe and never share it with others!
wallet.securityTipEVM: EVM private keys can be imported to MetaMask, Trust Wallet, and other wallets
wallet.securityTipSolana: Solana private keys are in 64-byte array format and can be imported to Phantom, Solflare, and other wallets
wallet.securityTipSave: Please save the private key in a secure place (such as a password manager)
wallet.securityTipNoScreenshot: Do not take screenshots or transmit the private key over the internet
wallet.securityTipControl: Anyone with the private key can control the wallet funds
wallet.noPrivateKey: This wallet has no exportable private key
wallet.exportFailed: Failed to get private key, please retry

settings.title: Settings
settings.noNetworksDesc: Click 'Add Custom Network' above to get started
settings.tip1: It's recommended to configure multiple RPC URLs for each network to improve connection stability
settings.tip2: Custom networks support both testnet and mainnet configurations
settings.tip3: It's recommended to test the connection before editing network to ensure configuration is correct
settings.rpcRedundancyTip: It's recommended to configure multiple URLs for redundancy
settings.saveChainFailed: Failed to save chain configuration, please retry
settings.saveSolanaFailed: Failed to save Solana network configuration, please retry
